title: Teamwork!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Which one should Rin get, nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>These ice cream flavors all look delicious, right? It’s hard for me to decide too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I want to have about 10 scoops, nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If you do that, you’ll definitely get a stomach ache.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s true~ Rin wants to eat lots of ice cream. If only Rin had a stronger stomach, nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I know a way for us to be able to eat more ice cream.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Huh? What is it? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s buy different flavors of ice cream together and share! Then we’ll be able to enjoy two different flavors, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s it, nya~! Rin will order ramune flavor then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright, I’ll order lemon flavor. Let’s go eat at that park over there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
